original_text: Jacob built an altar there. He called the place El Bethel, because that was where God appeared to him. God had appeared to him when he was running away from his brother Esau.
korean_text: 그가 거기서 제단을 쌓고 그 곳을 엘벧엘이라 불렀으니 이는 그의 형의 낯을 피할 때에 하나님이 거기서 그에게 나타나셨음이더라

sentences.original_text: He called the place El Bethel,
because that was where God appeared to him.
when he was running away from his brother Esau.
sentences.korean_translation: 그가 그의 형 에서에게서 도망하고 있을 때입니다.
